[Advancing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1827)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 12 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto heavy armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This rune charges up as you defeat your foes, driving you forward across the battlefield with every victory.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))   **Requirements** Your last action or activity reduced an enemy to 0 Hit Points; **Effect** You Stride up to 15 feet. This movement doesn't trigger reactions. You can [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=93), [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94), or [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.
